REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1029 reute b f BC-FRENCH-CAISSE-NATIONA 03-19 0057

TEXT.TITLE: FRENCH CAISSE NATIONALE DES AUTOROUTES ISSUES BOND
TEXT.BODY: Caisse Nationale des Autoroutes is issuing a three billion French franc bond, the French bond issuing committee said. The issue will be lead-managed by Caisse Nationale du Credit Agricole, Credit Lyonnais and Cie Financiere de Paribas subsidiary Credit du Nord. REUTER
